name: Steven Ashford
description:
I consider myself to be a loyal, loving, caring, intelligent and honest person, so I’m looking for the same in someone else. I have a lot to offer because of my ability to see the beauty in others. I truly enjoy life and I have been told I have a great attitude. I value each and every day and the special people that God puts in my life.
I am just excited about life! Waking up in the morning and knowing that God still loves me is by far the best thing on Earth!!i would rather you find out for yourself. The best in a man is found deep within.
